title: nf-core/isoseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bam.errorMessage: Subreads BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam' or being 'None' if the entrypoint is 'map'

pbi.errorMessage: PacBio Index file for BAM subreads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam.pbi' or being 'None' if the entrypoint is 'map'

reads.errorMessage: Long reads file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam.pbi' or being 'None' if the entrypoint is 'isoseq'
